title: E71 Spicy Highways and the New Brazilian Evangelical Gay Church of Murderers
description:
In episode 71, Em covers the Yuma Territorial Prison, Arizona’s first prison, built by its own inmates…and still haunted by them. Meanwhile, Christine covers the gruesome double-murder perpetrated by 18-year-old Suzane von Richthofen and her boyfriend. And that's why we drink! 
Go to felixgrayglasses.com/drink to try a pair of Felix Gray glasses today!
